mapper.sql: ID, RUN_ID, PRCS_ID, USER_ID, PRCS_TIME, DELIVER_TIME, PRCS_FLAG, FLOW_PRCS, OP_FLAG, TOP_FLAG, PARENT, CHILD_RUN, TIME_OUT, TIME_OUT_TEMP, TIME_OUT_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, FROM_USER, ACTIVE_TIME, PRCS_DEPT, PARENT_PRCS_ID, BACK_PRCS_ID, BACK_FLOW_PRCS, TIME_OUT_ATTEND, TIME_OUT_TYPE, RUN_PRCS_NAME, RUN_PRCS_ID, MOBILE_FLAG, IS_REMIND, TEMP_PRCS_FLAG, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into flow_run_prcs (RUN_ID, PRCS_ID, USER_ID, PRCS_TIME, DELIVER_TIME, PRCS_FLAG, FLOW_PRCS, OP_FLAG, TOP_FLAG, PARENT, CHILD_RUN, TIME_OUT, TIME_OUT_TEMP, TIME_OUT_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, FROM_USER, ACTIVE_TIME, PRCS_DEPT, PARENT_PRCS_ID, BACK_PRCS_ID, BACK_FLOW_PRCS, TIME_OUT_ATTEND, TIME_OUT_TYPE, RUN_PRCS_NAME, RUN_PRCS_ID, MOBILE_FLAG, IS_REMIND, TEMP_PRCS_FLAG, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE, FREE_ITEM, OTHER_USER, COMMENT ) values ( #{runId}, #{prcsId}, #{userId}, #{prcsTime}, #{deliverTime}, #{prcsFlag}, #{flowPrcs}, #{opFlag}, #{topFlag}, #{parent}, #{childRun}, #{timeOut}, #{timeOutTemp}, #{timeOutFlag}, #{createTime}, #{fromUser}, #{activeTime}, #{prcsDept}, #{parentPrcsId}, #{backPrcsId}, #{backFlowPrcs}, #{timeOutAttend}, #{timeOutType}, #{runPrcsName}, #{runPrcsId}, #{mobileFlag}, #{isRemind}, #{tempPrcsFlag}, #{workingdaysType}, #{freeItem}, #{otherUser}, #{comment} )

mapper.update:
update flow_run_prcs
RUN_ID = #{runId},
PRCS_ID = #{prcsId},
USER_ID = #{userId},
PRCS_TIME = #{prcsTime},
DELIVER_TIME = #{deliverTime},
PRCS_FLAG = #{prcsFlag},
FLOW_PRCS = #{flowPrcs},
OP_FLAG = #{opFlag},
TOP_FLAG = #{topFlag},
PARENT = #{parent},
CHILD_RUN = #{childRun},
TIME_OUT = #{timeOut},
TIME_OUT_TEMP = #{timeOutTemp},
TIME_OUT_FLAG = #{timeOutFlag},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
FROM_USER = #{fromUser},
ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime},
PRCS_DEPT = #{prcsDept},
PARENT_PRCS_ID = #{parentPrcsId},
BACK_PRCS_ID = #{backPrcsId},
BACK_FLOW_PRCS = #{backFlowPrcs},
TIME_OUT_ATTEND = #{timeOutAttend},
TIME_OUT_TYPE = #{timeOutType},
RUN_PRCS_NAME = #{runPrcsName},
RUN_PRCS_ID = #{runPrcsId},
MOBILE_FLAG = #{mobileFlag},
IS_REMIND = #{isRemind},
TEMP_PRCS_FLAG = #{tempPrcsFlag},
WORKINGDAYS_TYPE = #{workingdaysType},
FREE_ITEM = #{freeItem},
OTHER_USER = #{otherUser},
COMMENT = #{comment},
where RUN_ID = #{runId}

update flow_run_prcs set RUN_ID = #{runId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRCS_ID = #{prcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRCS_TIME = #{prcsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELIVER_TIME = #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRCS_FLAG = #{prcsFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, FLOW_PRCS = #{flowPrcs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OP_FLAG = #{opFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_FLAG = #{topFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_RUN = #{childRun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_OUT = #{timeOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_OUT_TEMP = #{timeOutTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_OUT_FLAG = #{timeOutFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FROM_USER = #{fromUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRCS_DEPT = #{prcsDept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_PRCS_ID = #{parentPrcsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_PRCS_ID = #{backPrcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BACK_FLOW_PRCS = #{backFlowPrcs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_OUT_ATTEND = #{timeOutAttend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TIME_OUT_TYPE = #{timeOutType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RUN_PRCS_NAME = #{runPrcsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_PRCS_ID = #{runPrcsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_FLAG = #{mobileFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_REMIND = #{isRemind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMP_PRCS_FLAG = #{tempPrcsFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE = #{workingdaysType,jdbcType=CHAR}, FREE_ITEM = #{freeItem,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OTHER_USER = #{otherUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flow_run_prcs set RUN_ID = #{runId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRCS_ID = #{prcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRCS_TIME = #{prcsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELIVER_TIME = #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRCS_FLAG = #{prcsFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, FLOW_PRCS = #{flowPrcs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OP_FLAG = #{opFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_FLAG = #{topFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_RUN = #{childRun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_OUT = #{timeOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_OUT_TEMP = #{timeOutTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_OUT_FLAG = #{timeOutFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FROM_USER = #{fromUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRCS_DEPT = #{prcsDept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_PRCS_ID = #{parentPrcsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_PRCS_ID = #{backPrcsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BACK_FLOW_PRCS = #{backFlowPrcs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_OUT_ATTEND = #{timeOutAttend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TIME_OUT_TYPE = #{timeOutType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RUN_PRCS_NAME = #{runPrcsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_PRCS_ID = #{runPrcsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_FLAG = #{mobileFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_REMIND = #{isRemind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMP_PRCS_FLAG = #{tempPrcsFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, WORKINGDAYS_TYPE = #{workingdaysType,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT fr.RUN_ID, fr.WORK_LEVEL, fr.FLOW_ID, fr.RUN_NAME, fr.BEGIN_USER, fr.BEGIN_DEPT, fp.PRCS_NAME, frp.ID, frp.USER_ID, frp.PRCS_ID, frp.FLOW_PRCS, frp.COMMENT, frp.OP_FLAG, frp.TOP_FLAG, frp.PRCS_FLAG, frp.TIME_OUT_FLAG, frp.PRCS_TIME, frp.CREATE_TIME, frp.DELIVER_TIME, frp.TIME_OUT_TYPE, frp.TIME_OUT_ATTEND, frp.IS_REMIND, frp.TIME_OUT FROM FLOW_RUN_PRCS frp INNER JOIN FLOW_RUN fr ON fr.RUN_ID = frp.RUN_ID LEFT JOIN FLOW_PROCESS fp ON fp.FLOW_ID = fr.FLOW_ID WHERE frp.PRCS_FLAG IN ('1', '2') AND frp.CHILD_RUN ='0' AND frp.USER_ID=#{userId} AND fr.DEL_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY fr.RUN_ID ORDER BY frp.IS_REMIND DESC, frp.RUN_ID DESC, fr.WORK_LEVEL DESC

SELECT fr.RUN_ID, fr.WORK_LEVEL, fr.FLOW_ID, fr.RUN_NAME, fr.BEGIN_USER, fr.BEGIN_DEPT, fp.PRCS_NAME, frp.ID, frp.USER_ID, frp.PRCS_ID, frp.FLOW_PRCS, frp.COMMENT, frp.OP_FLAG, frp.TOP_FLAG, frp.PRCS_FLAG, frp.TIME_OUT_FLAG, frp.PRCS_TIME, frp.CREATE_TIME, frp.DELIVER_TIME, frp.TIME_OUT_TYPE, frp.TIME_OUT_ATTEND, frp.IS_REMIND, frp.TIME_OUT FROM FLOW_RUN_PRCS frp INNER JOIN FLOW_RUN fr ON fr.RUN_ID = frp.RUN_ID LEFT JOIN FLOW_PROCESS fp ON fp.FLOW_ID = fr.FLOW_ID where frp.PRCS_FLAG = '4' AND frp.CHILD_RUN = '0' AND frp.USER_ID=#{userId} AND fr.DEL_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY fr.RUN_ID ORDER BY frp.IS_REMIND DESC, frp.RUN_ID DESC, fr.WORK_LEVEL DESC

SELECT fr.RUN_ID, fr.WORK_LEVEL, fr.FLOW_ID, fr.RUN_NAME, fr.BEGIN_USER, fr.BEGIN_DEPT, fp.PRCS_NAME, frp.ID, frp.USER_ID, frp.PRCS_ID, frp.FLOW_PRCS, frp.COMMENT, frp.OP_FLAG, frp.TOP_FLAG, frp.PRCS_FLAG, frp.TIME_OUT_FLAG, frp.PRCS_TIME, frp.CREATE_TIME, frp.DELIVER_TIME, frp.TIME_OUT_TYPE, frp.TIME_OUT_ATTEND, frp.IS_REMIND, frp.TIME_OUT FROM FLOW_RUN_PRCS frp INNER JOIN FLOW_RUN fr ON fr.RUN_ID = frp.RUN_ID LEFT JOIN FLOW_PROCESS fp ON fp.FLOW_ID = fr.FLOW_ID where frp.PRCS_FLAG = '6' AND frp.CHILD_RUN = '0' AND frp.USER_ID=#{userId} AND fr.DEL_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY fr.RUN_ID ORDER BY frp.IS_REMIND DESC, frp.RUN_ID DESC, fr.WORK_LEVEL DESC

SELECT fr.RUN_ID, fr.WORK_LEVEL, fr.FLOW_ID, fr.RUN_NAME, fr.BEGIN_USER, fr.BEGIN_DEPT, fp.PRCS_NAME, frp.ID, frp.USER_ID, frp.PRCS_ID, frp.FLOW_PRCS, frp.COMMENT, frp.OP_FLAG, frp.TOP_FLAG, frp.PRCS_FLAG, frp.TIME_OUT_FLAG, frp.PRCS_TIME, frp.CREATE_TIME, frp.DELIVER_TIME, frp.TIME_OUT_TYPE, frp.TIME_OUT_ATTEND, frp.IS_REMIND, frp.TIME_OUT FROM FLOW_RUN_PRCS frp INNER JOIN FLOW_RUN fr ON fr.RUN_ID = frp.RUN_ID LEFT JOIN FLOW_PROCESS fp ON fp.FLOW_ID = fr.FLOW_ID where frp.CHILD_RUN = '0' AND frp.USER_ID=#{userId} AND fr.DEL_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY fr.RUN_ID ORDER BY frp.IS_REMIND DESC, frp.RUN_ID DESC, fr.WORK_LEVEL DESC
SELECT fpr.DELIVER_TIME FROM flow_run_prcs fpr WHERE fpr.PRCS_ID = #{prcsId} AND fpr.RUN_ID = #{runId}
